name: Recipe For Blood
description:
Welcome to my game, 

How To Play:

To play left click towers in tower bar and place them by left clicking on an empty slot,  and collect fangs by mousing over them. The goal is to try and survive until the end! (5 waves) My game is inspired primarily by Plants vs Zombies. *also press P or Esc to pause*

This is my first Game jam ever and I worked alone on it! It was a lot of fun and a good learning experience. Especially since you have to decide what the most important features are, since you only have 72hrs

Thank you for playing!

(Made for MiniJam118:Vampires , Limitation: Blood is Lethal)
